read_xml_primitives.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! read_xml_prims.f90 - Read routines for primitive data
00002 !
00003 ! $Id: read_xml_prims.f90,v 1.7 2007/12/07 10:38:41 arjenmarkus Exp $
00004 !
00005 ! Arjen Markus
00006 !
00007 ! General information:
00008 ! This module is part of the XML-Fortran library. Its
00009 ! purpose is to help read individual items from an XML
00010 ! file into the variables that have been connected to
00011 ! the various tags. It is used by the code generated
00012 ! by the make_xml_reader program.
00013 !
00014 ! Because the routines differ mostly by the type of the
00015 ! output variable, the body is included, to prevent
00016 ! too much repeated blocks of code with all the maintenance
00017 ! issues that causes.
00018 !
00019 module read_xml_primitives
00020    use xmlparse
00021    implicit none
00022 
00023    private :: read_from_buffer
00024    private :: read_from_buffer_integers
00025    private :: read_from_buffer_reals
00026    private :: read_from_buffer_doubles
00027    private :: read_from_buffer_logicals
00028    private :: read_from_buffer_words
00029 
00030    interface read_from_buffer
00031       module procedure read_from_buffer_integers
00032       module procedure read_from_buffer_reals
00033       module procedure read_from_buffer_doubles
00034       module procedure read_from_buffer_logicals
00035       module procedure read_from_buffer_words
00036    end interface
00037 
00038 contains
00039 
00040 ! skip_until_endtag --
00041 !    Routine to read the XML file until the end tag is encountered
00042 !
00043 ! Arguments:
00044 !    info        The XML file data structure
00045 !    tag         The tag in question
00046 !    attribs     Array of attributes and their values
00047 !    data        Array of strings, representing the data
00048 !    error       Has an error occurred?
00049 !
00050 subroutine skip_until_endtag( info, tag, attribs, data, error )
00051    type(XML_PARSE), intent(inout)                  :: info
00052    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: tag
00053    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00054    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00055    logical, intent(out)                            :: error
00056 
00057    integer                                         :: noattribs
00058    integer                                         :: nodata
00059    integer                                         :: ierr
00060    logical                                         :: endtag
00061    character(len=len(tag))                         :: newtag
00062 
00063    error = .true.
00064    do
00065       call xml_get( info, newtag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, &
00066                     data, nodata )
00067       if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00068          error = .true.
00069          exit
00070       endif
00071       if ( endtag .and. newtag == tag ) then
00072          exit
00073       endif
00074    enddo
00075 end subroutine skip_until_endtag
00076 
00077 ! read_xml_integer --
00078 !    Routine to read a single integer from the parsed data
00079 !
00080 ! Arguments:
00081 !    info        XML parser structure
00082 !    tag         The tag in question (error message only)
00083 !    endtag      End tag found? (Dummy argument, actually)
00084 !    attribs     Array of attributes and their values
00085 !    noattribs   Number of attributes found
00086 !    data        Array of strings, representing the data
00087 !    nodata      Number of data strings
00088 !    var         Variable to be filled
00089 !    has_var     Has the variable been set?
00090 !
00091 subroutine read_xml_integer( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00092                              var, has_var )
00093    integer, intent(inout)                       :: var
00094 
00095    include 'read_xml_scalar.inc'
00096 
00097 end subroutine read_xml_integer
00098 
00099 ! read_xml_line --
00100 !    Routine to read a single line of text from the parsed data
00101 !
00102 ! Arguments:
00103 !    info        XML parser structure
00104 !    tag         The tag in question (error message only)
00105 !    endtag      End tag found? (Dummy argument, actually)
00106 !    attribs     Array of attributes and their values
00107 !    noattribs   Number of attributes found
00108 !    data        Array of strings, representing the data
00109 !    nodata      Number of data strings
00110 !    var         Variable to be filled
00111 !    has_var     Has the variable been set?
00112 !
00113 subroutine read_xml_line( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00114                           var, has_var )
00115    type(XML_PARSE), intent(inout)               :: info
00116    character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00117    logical, intent(inout)                       :: endtag
00118    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(in) :: attribs
00119    integer, intent(in)                          :: noattribs
00120    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(in)   :: data
00121    integer, intent(in)                          :: nodata
00122    character(len=*), intent(inout)              :: var
00123    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_var
00124 
00125    character(len=len(attribs(1,1)))             :: buffer
00126    integer                                      :: idx
00127    integer                                      :: ierr
00128 
00129    !
00130    ! The value can be stored in an attribute value="..." or in
00131    ! the data
00132    !
00133    has_var = .false.
00134    idx = xml_find_attrib( attribs, noattribs, 'value', buffer )
00135    if ( idx > 0 ) then
00136       var     = buffer
00137       has_var = .true.
00138    else
00139       do idx = 1,nodata
00140          if ( data(idx) /= ' ' ) then
00141             var = data(idx)
00142             has_var = .true.
00143             exit
00144          endif
00145       enddo
00146    endif
00147 end subroutine read_xml_line
00148

00184 ! read_xml_integer_array --

00198 !
00199 subroutine read_xml_integer_array( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, &
00200                                    nodata, var, has_var )
00201    integer, dimension(:), pointer                :: var
00202 
00203    include 'read_xml_array.inc'
00204 
00205 end subroutine read_xml_integer_array

00207 ! read_xml_line_array --
00208 !    Routine to read an array of lines of text from the parsed data
00209 !
00210 ! Arguments:
00211 !    info        XML parser structure
00212 !    tag         The tag in question (error message only)
00213 !    attribs     Array of attributes and their values
00214 !    noattribs   Number of attributes found
00215 !    data        Array of strings, representing the data
00216 !    nodata      Number of data strings
00217 !    var         Variable to be filled
00218 !    has_var     Has the variable been set?
00219 !
00220 subroutine read_xml_line_array( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, &
00221                                 nodata, var, has_var )
00222    type(XML_PARSE), intent(inout)                :: info
00223    character(len=*), intent(in)                  :: tag
00224    logical, intent(inout)                        :: endtag
00225    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(in)  :: attribs
00226    integer, intent(in)                           :: noattribs
00227    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(in)    :: data
00228    integer, intent(in)                           :: nodata
00229    character(len=*), dimension(:), pointer       :: var
00230    logical, intent(inout)                        :: has_var
00231 
00232    character(len=len(attribs(1,1)))              :: buffer
00233    integer                                       :: idx
00234    integer                                       :: idxv
00235    integer                                       :: ierr
00236    logical                                       :: started
00237 
00238    !
00239    ! The value can be stored in an attribute values="..." or in
00240    ! the data
00241    !
00242    has_var = .false.
00243    idx = xml_find_attrib( attribs, noattribs, 'values', buffer )
00244    if ( idx > 0 ) then
00245       allocate( var(1:1) )
00246       var(1) = buffer
00247       if ( buffer /= ' ' ) then
00248          has_var = .true.
00249       endif
00250    else
00251       idxv    = 0
00252       started = .false.
00253       do idx = 1,nodata
00254          if ( data(idx) /= ' ' .or. started ) then
00255             if ( .not. started ) then
00256                allocate( var(1:nodata-idx+1) )
00257                started = .true.
00258             endif
00259             idxv = idxv + 1
00260             var(idxv) = data(idx)
00261          endif
00262       enddo
00263       if ( started ) then
00264          has_var = .true.
00265       endif
00266    endif
00267 end subroutine read_xml_line_array
00268

00355 ! read_xml_word_1dim, ... -
00356 !    Read an array of "words" (or ...) but from different elements
00357 !
00358 subroutine read_xml_integer_1dim( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00359                                   var, has_var )
00360    type(XML_PARSE), intent(inout)                :: info
00361    character(len=*), intent(in)                  :: tag
00362    logical, intent(inout)                        :: endtag
00363    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(in)  :: attribs
00364    integer, intent(in)                           :: noattribs
00365    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(in)    :: data
00366    integer, intent(in)                           :: nodata
00367    integer, dimension(:), pointer                :: var
00368    logical, intent(inout)                        :: has_var
00369 
00370    integer,dimension(:), pointer                 :: newvar
00371    character(len=len(attribs(1,1)))              :: buffer
00372    integer                                       :: newsize
00373    integer                                       :: ierr
00374 
00375    newsize = size(var) + 1
00376    allocate( newvar(1:newsize) )
00377    newvar(1:newsize-1) = var
00378    deallocate( var )
00379    var => newvar
00380 
00381    call read_xml_integer( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00382                           var(newsize), has_var )
00383 
00384 end subroutine read_xml_integer_1dim
00385
